kentauros.run package¶

Submodules¶

kentauros.run.common module¶

common code for run() entry points

kentauros.run.common.get_action_args(cli_args, pkgname, action_type_enum)[source]¶

This function returns arguments for an Action() constructor as tuple. It only constructs Package() objects as needed.

Parameters:
  • cli_args (CLIArgs) – parsed command line arguments
  • pkgname (str) – name of package the action will be executed for
  • action_type_enum (ActionType) – specifies the type of Action
Returns:

kentauros.action.Action Constructor arguments
Return type:

tuple

kentauros.run.ktr module¶

this file contains the run() function called by ‘ktr’ as entry point

kentauros.run.ktr.run()[source]¶

will be run if executed by ‘ktr’ script

kentauros.run.ktr_config module¶

this file contains the run_config() function called by ‘ktr_config’ as entry point

kentauros.run.ktr_config.run_config()[source]¶

will be run if executed by ‘ktr-config’ script

Module contents¶

This module contains the ‘run’ and ‘run_config’ main functions that are called when the package is executed by the setuptools-installed ‘ktr’ or ‘ktr-config’ scripts.

kentauros.run.run()[source]¶

will be run if executed by ‘ktr’ script

kentauros.run.run_config()[source]¶

will be run if executed by ‘ktr-config’ script
